pullrequest.title: issue #1523: process selection msgs in qt connection event in GLWidget

content.raw: If I understand this right, this will change the selection behavior. Currently if you select an object in a single gzclient, it will try to select that object in all other `gzclient` instances. Here you are proposing that selections in a single `gzclient` should not affect other `gzclient`'s. That makes sense to me, in case you want to inspect different models in each `gzclient` instance.
